casebody.data:
KHAJA
v.
HUSNA. No. 375A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 25, 2015. Deborah Sandlin, for Khaja, Dabeeruddin. Debra A. Griffiths. Fatima Husna, Santa Clara, for Husna, Fatima.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of November 2015 by Defendant-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of November 2015."
